FTL-Method: Stargates
Ship-module: None
Stations: Stargates
of different sizes that may form part of bigger stations, with

defensive equipment like shield generators etc.
Stargates are
connected in pairs. They can be destroyed by weapons fire (or self
destruction). The owner may reconnect them at will (the reconnection
needs a spin-up-time). The permissible distance between gates and the
(re)connection time depend on tech. The bigger the connection-distance
and diameter of the gate the more energy is necessary to maintain it.
